name: Secutor
details:
This talent grants the Shieldsmanship passive power.
Increases by 10%: Crushing Damage Bonus|Crushing Damage Bonus Cap|Final Mitigations Cap
You can now equip: Runic Axes|Runic Longswords|Runic Maces|Runic Short Swords|Runic Bucklers|Runic Medium Shields|Runic Tower Shields|Tower Shields
